item.title: CVE-2024-7071|2024-08-27T13:57:55.604Z -- brain%20information%20technologies%20inc. -- brain%20low-code
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection'), CWE - 564 - SQL Injection: Hibernate vulnerability in Brain Information Technologies Inc. Brain Low-Code allows SQL Injection.This issue affects Brain Low-Code: before 2.1.0.
